name: Epic Adventures: La Jangada
description:
Help Minha in the hidden object adventure to save her father from the gallows in this 19th century. The epic story is based on Jules Verne’s novel La Jangada. Find evidence spread around the Jangada, search for clues to unravel the mystery of Joam Dacosta’s past and solve intriuging puzzles as you travel through the great Amazon.

- Search for hidden objects
- Solve puzzles and mini games
- Uncover the truth behind a great mystery
- Immersive atmosphere and captivating story
- Help Minha save her father
